greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Max _{2<=k<=n} floor(A242720(k)/prime(k)) - prime(n).
comment: Conjecture: a(n) = o(prime(n)), as n goes to infinity.

If the conjecture is true, then A242720(n) ~ prime(n)^2. Indeed, A242720(n) >= prime(n)^2 + 2*prime(n) + 3; on the other hand, by the conjecture, we have A242720(n)/prime(n) <= a(n) + 1 + prime(n) = prime(n)*(1+o(1)).
link: Peter J. C. Moses, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..2501
results.author: _Vladimir Shevelev_, Sep 04 2014
ext: More terms from _Peter J. C. Moses_, Sep 04 2014
